subject: Labor
title: Serrano vs. Isetann (G.R. No. 117040)
ratio: If the dismissal is for a just cause but without statutory due process, the dismissal is valid but the employer must pay nominal damages.
mnemonic: Serrano: Just Cause, No Process = Damages

subject: Labor
title: Agabon vs. NLRC (G.R. No. 158693)
ratio: Reiterated that the dismissal for a just cause but without notice/hearing is valid; increased nominal damages to P30,000 for just cause and P50,000 for authorized cause.

subject: Labor
title: Sonza vs. ABS-CBN (G.R. No. 138051)
ratio: Established that a 'Talent' or high-profile broadcaster may be an independent contractor rather than an employee based on the Four-Fold Test.

subject: Labor
title: Four-Fold Test Doctrine
ratio: To determine Employer-Employee relationship: (1) Selection/engagement, (2) Payment of wages, (3) Power of dismissal, (4) Power of control (The most important).
